attributes.action: improve employment law to stop employers adding pay rises to attendance allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my employer introduced attendance allowance which is ok but every time we get a pay rise he adds it to the allowance and not our basic pay so if you have a genuine reason for a day off for say sickness not only do you lose the attendance allowance but also all the pay rises

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
